channel.title: Simplicity is a form of art... - unlabeled

item.title: Why oh why does a process run in unlabeled_t?
item.description:
If you notice that a process is running in the unlabeled_t domain, the first question to ask is how it got there.

Well, one way is to have a process running in a known domain, like screen_t, after which the SELinux policy module that provides this domain is removed from â€¦
item.dc:creator: Sven Vermeulen
